name: Dust Storm
descr: [Dust Storm](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0031) is a threat group that has targeted multiple industries in Japan, South Korea, the United States, Europe, and several Southeast Asian countries. (Citation: Cylance Dust Storm)

Cylance Dust Storm.description: Gross, J. (2016, February 23). Operation Dust Storm. Retrieved December 22, 2021.
